RecordVariable.name: Channel_ADC00_Label
RecordVariable.description: Label for ADC00. This channel is the Channel Label for the 400V Input Voltage.

RecordVariable.name: ADC00_Avg
RecordVariable.description: The Average for 400V Input Voltage. (Power Can channel ADC00)

RecordVariable.name: ADC00_NumSamps
RecordVariable.longName: ADC00/ 400V Input Volt Number of Samples
RecordVariable.description: The Number of Samples for 400V Input Voltage. (Power Can channel ADC00)

RecordVariable.name: ADC00_Min
RecordVariable.description: The Minimum for 400V Input Voltage. (Power Can channel ADC00)

RecordVariable.name: ADC00_Max
RecordVariable.description: The Maximum for 400V Input Voltage. (Power Can ADC00)

RecordVariable.name: ADC00_Err_Flag
RecordVariable.description: The Error Flag Value for 400V Input Voltage. (Power Can channel ADC00)
